named-query.name: READ_DISTINCT_CODE_TYPES
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT code.type FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.type.site.name = :siteName

named-query.name: READ_CODE_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT codeType FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.CodeType codeType WHERE codeType.name = :codeType AND codeType.site.name = :siteName

named-query.name: READ_SINGLE_ACTIVE_CODE_BY_SITE_AND_CODE_TYPE_AND_CODE_VALUE
named-query.query: SELECT code FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.type.site.name = :siteName AND code.type.name = :codeType AND code.value = :value AND code.inactive != TRUE

named-query.name: READ_CODES_BY_SITE_AND_CODE_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT code FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.type.site.name = :siteName AND code.type.name = :codeType ORDER BY code.value

named-query.name: READ_CODES_BY_SITE_AND_CODE_TYPE_AND_CODE_VALUE
named-query.query: SELECT code FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.type.site.name = :siteName AND code.type.name = :codeType AND code.value LIKE :value AND code.inactive = FALSE ORDER BY code.value

named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_CODES_BY_SITE_AND_CODE_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT code FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.type.site.name = :siteName AND code.type.name = :codeType AND code.inactive = FALSE ORDER BY code.value

named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_CODES_BY_SITE_AND_CODE_TYPE_AND_CODE_VALUE
named-query.query: SELECT code FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.type.site.name = :siteName AND code.type.name = :codeType AND code.value LIKE :value AND code.inactive != TRUE ORDER BY code.value

named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_CODES_BY_SITE_AND_CODE_TYPE_AND_CODE_VALUE_AND_CODE_DESCRIPTION
named-query.query: SELECT code FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.type.site.name = :siteName AND code.type.name = :codeType AND code.value LIKE :value AND code.description LIKE :description AND code.inactive = :inactive ORDER BY code.value

named-query.name: READ_CODES_BY_SITE_AND_CODE_TYPE_AND_CODE_VALUE_AND_CODE_DESCRIPTION
named-query.query: SELECT code FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.Code code WHERE code.type.site.name = :siteName AND code.type.name = :codeType AND code.value LIKE :value AND code.description LIKE :description ORDER BY code.value
